text: Anandiben Patel (born 21 November 1941) is an Indian politician. She was the former Chief Minister of Gujarat. She was the first female chief minister of the state. She was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) since 1987. She was the Cabinet Minister for Education from 2002 to 2007. In 19 January 2018, she became the Governor of Madhya Pradesh replacing Om Prakash Kohli who was holding additional charge since September 2016.Former Gujarat CM Anandiben Patel to be up's governor In July 2020, she became Governor of Madhya Pradesh again. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1941 births Category:Governors of Uttar Pradesh Category:Governors of Madhya Pradesh Category:Governors of Chhattisgarh Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians Category:Politicians from Gujarat Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Anandiben Patel
